answers.answer: It's cause it's pure sugar! Lol
I almost gagged drinking that this morning...it tasted like sweet koolaid & flat sunkist!
that stuff is probably the most disgusting stuff ever. worse than chitterlings.
Its all that,sugar lol my baby was the same way lol.....
Wwaayyy too much sugar..he just want go to sleep i drunk it at 9am here it is 12:26am & he has yet to calm down

Thank god I was only 13 weeks when I drank it lol so I can't feel the baby move yet but I agree it was disgusting, the guy comes in and goes "ok, I need you to drink this, you have 5 minutes from the time you start and after you drink it you can't eat drink smoke or chew gum then ill come get you in an hour ok??" I'm like damn that's quite the order lol but it tasted like orange soda that has been sitting in a glass on the counter for like 10 days. >.<
It just made me sick and him going crazy in there just made me feel worse. But yeah, all that sugar really got him going.
Ugh, I have to take the test tomorrow, not looking forward to it. Does it only come in orange? I am allergic to red dye so I hope they have other flavors.
With mines i git to take the drink home & just drink it 30min b4 my appt so i wouldn't have to sit there so long but we ended up being there over 2hrs b/c my dr was in surgery.

I had to drink Cold Lucozade( energy drink) for my test... I was 24wks at the time n weather was -1° here in uk... I had worst cold... I was sneezing n sneezing.. My whole body was in ache especially my lower abdomen lol... After drinking that i couldnt get out of bed for 3 days... I started producing mucus in cough n my nose was all red.. S*ucked* my days up lol...But answer to ur question it didnt effect him much... No matter how much sugar i eat.. It hardly makes him move... He moves on its own will.. N mostly on spicy food lol...

question: Has anybody noticed that after drinking the stuff for the diabetes test that the baby seems more active b/c my son has been flipping around all day!?
title: is it just me?
